Title: Why do I feel so bad that my abuser is probably going to jail?
Body:
I left my ex husband 4 years ago after he strangled me. We have a child together, who was 6 months old at the time. I called the cops and left and got an Order of Protection. He was given supervised visitation for 2 years. He was also charged by the states attorneys office since I didnt press charges. They charged him with a felony for Aggravated Domestic Battery/Strangulation, a felony for unlawful restraint, and 2 misdemeanors for domestic battery. They dropped the Aggravated Domestic Battery/Strangulation charge and he accepted a plea deal for the Unlawful Restraint charge. They gave him 2.5 years of probation, and required him to do batterers intervention classes and community service. 

We got divorced and I won full custody, but he was given unsupervised visits half the time since he was on good behavior for a couple of years. Things were good for a while, until he recently abused our 4 year old son by spanking him so hard that he left a very deep bruise in the shape of a hand on his butt. He was very traumatized from it. I was scared for him to go back to him unsupervised, so I reported it to the police and got an emergency OP for me and our son. CPS also became involved. Then we went back for a plenary OP. He admitted the abuse to the judge, but she still allowed him to continue with the unsupervised visits anyways. Well the day that he admitted the abuse to the judge, he was sent a notice for his probation to be revoked and for him to be resentenced. When he was originally convicted the states attorneys office said that the first offense would be probation, and the 2nd offense would be jail time. So hes probably going to jail. 

But why do I feel so guilty and responsible for reporting him? He has a car and a house and is trying to start a business. And he has his other child with him full time. I feel like I'm ruining his life. Part of me feels bad, but the other part of me knows I did the right thing bc Im worried for my sons safety, and I dont want him to turn out with all kinds of problems like his dad bc of the abuse. And he already shows signs of a child who has endured trauma. But hes so young, so I feel like I have a good chance of him healing from this. He starts therapy soon. I hate how empathetic I can be. Bc it makes me feel sorry for jerks too. I just know that jail is a terrible place to be, so I feel really bad for him. üò∞ But on the other hand I know I'm saving my kid, his other kid, and his current girlfriend from any kind of abuse. He made my life a living hell and hes truly an evil person. So I thought I'd be happy about this, but instead it's making me really depressed ‚òπ. Anyone else feel similarly?

Title: It‚Äôs been a year.
Body:
We had that once in a lifetime connection, shit that you fucking crave. It‚Äôs been a year since I left him.

We were on and off for 5 years, but towards the end he just got worse and worse and there was no coming back from the fucking abuse. 

Every week there was a new cut, bruise, story. I just knew I was going to die.

Here I am a year later. I know im fucking sick because I miss him. I crave him STILL. I miss that smell we had after sex. I‚Äôm fucking SICK but I NEED another dose of HIM. 

All the cops told me to get a restraining order. I keep postponing the court date because that means seeing you again. God. Does anyone know how hard it is to face someone you once loved in court? It‚Äôs so easy to tell someone to get a restraining order. Imagine telling your story in a court room‚Ä¶ reliving your trauma in front of people who don‚Äôt fucking get it. 

Tonight I feel like just firing my fucking lawyer and going back to you. I really don‚Äôt care if you do kill me. 

I just wanna throw this whole case away and go back to my old life.

The trips, the shopping sprees, they were fun.

Your touch, our kisses, the intense moments are like taking molly. Just pure euphoria. 

If you weren‚Äôt so fucking stupid we would‚Äôve been the best. You get in your emotions, you‚Äôre so fucking mean when your MAD. 

I just had to let this off my chest. I‚Äôm really contemplating just dropping this whole thing. I‚Äôm tired of dreaming about you when I can easily be up under you.

Title: Grateful
Body:
Hello!
I‚Äôm a little (very) tipsy right now, but as I sit with my partner I‚Äôm basically slapped across the face with a 2x4 of how grateful I am. 
I was once engaged to C U Next Tuesday. He beat and raped me frequently, always put me down, made me feel small, made me feel dependent. Just the worst. And I tried- like really tried- to make it better. It didn‚Äôt work. He came from money, and I was just supposed cook and clean and stay silent like his mother did for her husband. No ambition, no thoughts, just servitude. 
But now, NOW, I live with a man who not only loves me and values me, but invests in me. Loves spending time with me. Cares about my wants and needs. Cuddles my cat. Found my g spot lol. 
I‚Äôm headed to get my law degree and a masters in the fall. I‚Äôm my own person again. I have sex because I WANT TO. I don‚Äôt always do the dishes because I DONT WANT TO. I‚Äôm not a trophy you show your friends, I‚Äôm prize to be won!!
Idk where I was going with this. I just see so many scary and awful things here, and I want to remind you that there‚Äôs good. And it does get better. 
All the love xx

Title: How did you officially cut ties with your abuser? *trigger warning*
Body:
My abuser is also my husband and the father of my child. I am not in love with him and I‚Äôm honestly just with him so he could help with our child.

But I honestly can‚Äôt do it anymore. This isn‚Äôt the first time he‚Äôs hit me or her. Today it was me and it‚Äôs bad. He choked me 3 times, to the point where it hurts to swallow, and it hurts where he put his hand on my neck. His choice of abuse is to always choke me. He‚Äôs also scratched my neck

I want to call the police but I can‚Äôt. I feel so fucking guilty. I feel bad for him, even after all the shit he does to me, I feel terrible. He‚Äôs my husband and my daughter‚Äôs dad. I feel like a monster to do that to him. But he doesn‚Äôt feel like a monster when he does this to me.

Title: Father's (55) wife (45) is being abused. Calls me (23). Little half brother (2) is there and her younger daughter (17) knows. General TW.
Body:
Please heed the trigger warnings - physical violence and sexyal abuse, rape. 

I apologize if this is jumbled. I am out of my element and disturbed. 

I have been getting calls from my father's wife and the situation is very serious. I don't know what to do. I messaged to her younger daughter who is with her own father's family right now, closer geographically, in hopes that the adults can help. I asked for the wife's permission for this and told her not to call or speak too loudly herself. 
Dad is dangerous, physically, and completely unhinged. 

Both me and her daughters are neurodiverse in various ways, my dad probably has whatever I have (mainly ADHD as it is genetic I guess).
The wife was diagnosed with some mood disorder. I do not feel adequate to deal with this on my own, but neither do I feel the other two children can handle it. Frankly, I feel we are all emotionally and socially 13 and may fuck things up further. 

A month ago I was with them and they were already tense. There's a bit of history of my parents divorce involved with the tensions between us all, and sometimes I'm afraid I set this in motion. 

I don't know when this began, but she mentioned physical abuse first about a week ago. The younger daughter, dad, wife and little brother were together here where I am now. (they are gone now to another remote countryside place, the girl is with her father's family, and my mother and her bf + his kids are here). 

The daughter witnessed him become "crazy" over a minor cooking thing, hold and squeeze her arms and try to throw her out of the house. 

Since then, he has hit her and humiliated her by pouring something over her (water? Sludge? It wasn't clear. Not bleach or acid or anything dangerous afaik). He also hides her phone sometimes. 

My mother wants me to stay away so I can keep a relationship with dad and inherit the place we are in right now, or just generally not get involved. 

I don't wish to get into a row with dad myself, but I don't know how to avoid it. Mum knows well enough that he is unstable and simultaneously wants me to stay away from his physical proximity. 

Essentially, I can't ask my own adults for help, and I don't trust the ones around the wife. 

The woman's schizophrenic sister is involved with her own abusive husband who used to rape her. They are deeply religious and below average IQ/ mental capacity. 

Woman's sister called HER about the husband and abuse situation multiple times, without anywhere to go, while I was here with them. A couple of times my dad picked up and tried to calm her down. 

Social workers have already targeted both families (woman's sister has a nonverbal 4 yo girl), due to the wife's alcohol problem as well. But they let go. 

Point is, can't call those people or get help. 

The entire social circle and extended family is festering with wifebeaters and abusers, multiple severe mental illnesses and disability, alcoholism, conservative fucking handmaid's tale type shit. 

I am safe and sound myself, and I never suffered serious abuse except verbally dad called me a "lesbianish freak". I KNOW he can threaten serious bodily harm or even murder when he is unhinged like that. He only had that once or twice in the 20 years when I was growing up, and he simply calmed down and cried and we left him alone/ it ended up fine as far as I can remember. 

My mum and him, however, broke up peacefully and he never raised a hand against her back then, so this is still new to me in magnitude and form. 

Because of his history, I still believe her. I believe the material comforts and well-being my mother allowed while they were married, his ability to work on his own "intellectual pursuits" and art stuff beside her kept him in check. 
Their life has objectively gone to shit, and of course, he physically takes it out on another human being now and blames her entire essence and self for it all. 

The safe, sane people around me don't wish to touch this situation with a 10 feet pole. I think my mother thinks they are all a lost cause. 

I am scared not only because of IPV but as she's a bisexual woman, possibly a lesbian, stuck with a raging, violent homophobe below the platitudes. He has already seriously hurt her. 

As much as she yells at me and blows up at the most minor things, I feel like in this case something must be done, and I don't know what. 

How do I make sure of her safety? 

I don't have my own place besides a dorm I can't go to right now, and all her relatives are insane or don't have room for her/their own homes either (like her daughters). That is, if I somehow even get her out of there. That is, if I figure out a way to do that and even involve myself without having to make myself a red hot target of homicide to dad. 

The house they are in has no electricity or water, she doesn't drive or own any other vehicle. Nearest village is about 5 km away from them. 


In case you are wondering, this is modern day Europe. Not a remote Texas town, not the furthrest reaches of Russia or a developing nation. This is here and now, and they're all psychiatric patients (wife, her sister, and the sister's husband have all been in inpatient treatment in an asylum. Dad is clearly mad. Her daughters are autistic with seletive mutism, and I am about to get diagnosed with the same, probably.) 

Please help because this is some sort of nightmare. 

Both me and my partner are also trans, and she is coming over in August. I don't know how I can bring her to this country, and I can feel I am getting paranoid about any possible course of action. 

Most of all, my little brother is there, and the woman's life is in danger and she can't get out. And I don't know who to trust and who could help.

Title: Stop romanticizing him
Body:
Honestly a big part of the recovery is realizing the truth of how my relationship was going vs what it actually was. Let‚Äôs set aside the ‚ÄúI should have been with someone who doesn‚Äôt hit me‚Äù aside‚Ä¶ it occurred to me that if I had the ability to hear his thoughts about me, it‚Äôd probably make me want to throw up.

Because honestly what was I thinking? He was talking to me about how women are trash and bitches, talking casually about rape, for sure believing he has the right to beat women to teach them a lesson‚Ä¶ and he thought I was a beautiful perfect angel? That I deserved to be treated well? NO. 

I thankfully won‚Äôt ever hear the thoughts from his dark twisted nasty brain, but I should remember that he was trash and I didn‚Äôt lose out on him, and the relationship we had is not anything that I should desire.

Title: Is it abuse? Tw: physical, verbal, eating disorders
Body:
We've been married 13 years and for the vast majority of that time he wasn't like this. He could be kind of an asshole but the last three years have gotten progressively worse. Is it abuse to tug on my wrists or grab me to keep me from walking away during an argument?

He's done it quite a few times, this morning I had to get up early for a medical procedure and he wanted to argue. I didn't have time and it turned into him grabbing my wrist as I was going down the front steps and making me fall. Our son saw it and was scared, none of the kids have seen him act like that before. By the time I got home my husband was crying and apologetic. 

We separated for a while because of his temper, he agreed to get treatment and moved back in and it isn't working out. I'm anorexic (in therapy) I'm at a low weight from stress and he's going between acting concerned for my health and using it against me. But he tells me he prefers me small and my weight has been a thing he focused on our entire relationship. 

I don't understand why he's being so mean. I don't know why he's antagonizing me after begging me to let him move back in. He thinks nothing is wrong and having another baby will solve our problems. 

The kids love him and they'd be devastated if he moved out again. I try to keep our problems away from the kids, idk how I would explain to them. I know it's weird but i don't want them think that of him. I'm also afraid to leave because he's threatened to use my ed to take them. 

Is it always destined to get worse, should I just deal with it? Part of me thinks I've put up with everything this long, I should wait for our oldest to turn 18.

Title: Witnessing domestic violence as a child/teenager in the past + mental stress as an adult
Body:
26 year old male here.

I just want to preface this by saying I feel happy right now, I am happy with my family and I love them and they love me. I am loved by both my parents, grandparents, and younger sister and I love them very much as well.

However, there has always been a splinter in our family history...there isn't a month where I don't sometimes think about my childhood and the occasional abuse that I witnessed from my father that was dealt to my mother. There were instances so ingrained in my memory of my father hitting or pushing my mom up until I was about 13 that to this day still haunts me. I remember vividly crying in the fetal position whenever these traumatic events occurred. My sister, thank goodness was not around most of the time for these events and it seems to have had a lesser effect on her life. I can't help but think that witnessing such events has somewhat aided‚Äîalbeit unconducive‚Äî in my progression of anxiety, panic attacks, and overall low self-esteem growing up; to this day, I still suffer from varying levels of anxiety and low self-esteem.

Things seemed very good and stable for the past decade. My mom and dad would get into the occasional fight every so often, couple times a year, but it never turned physical and they always resolved peacefully. My father has mellowed out a lot as he grew older, but I still can never forgive him for hitting my mom. When I was a child, I would frequently think of scenarios of overcoming my father when events of domestic violence occurred. running scenarios in my head of me growing older and beating the crap out of my dad if he were to ever touch my mom again.

Recently, primarily due to my issues with anxiety and having intrusive thoughts. and also having majored in Sociology and thinking about the effects of parental nurture on a child who has witnessed domestic violence on a parent, I can't help to think and be overcome by this fear of being like my father. It is without a doubt that children who witness traumatic events such as violence between parents often are at a greater risk of being violent themselves in their future relationships. This is one of the things I fear the most in myself. I know I am in control of my own future and I constantly tell myself that I will never ever be like my father and if I ever saw my father do that to my mother again, I would retaliate with force, but a part of me can't escape the sociological and psychological predisposition for children who witness domestic violence to grow up as adults and do it themselves to others in their relationship.

Apologies for the exposition...I never really wrote about this but these are just my thoughts and I wanted to know what you guys think...will I become my father? This has become one of the most anguishing fears to deal with and it haunts me.

Title: Help needed
Body: Hi everyone, so I'm not the one in an abusive relationship but my aunt is. Our family has known that he was emotionally abusive for a while now but my mom and I just recently found out that he's been physically abusive too for about a couple years give or take. My poor cousin has had to witness her being beaten by him and her husband has even tried to go after my cousin but my aunt steps in the way (her husband isn't my cousins dad thankfully). My cousin is out of harms way and is just staying with his dad full time. He's told my aunt that she needs to leave him and he won't come back to the house until he is gone for good (I'm so proud of him for this, he's a pre-teen and just so strong). She knows that she needs to leave him/kick him out, the last time he beat her she called the cops and he got sent to jail for a couple days but she let him back in the house. He brings NOTHING to the relationship, no job, no good insurance, money, literally nothing. Her husband's family even just got a restraining order (I believe from what my cousin knows) against him and they are in a completely different state. He's an alcoholic, and drug addict with a pretty long rap sheet from when he was in a different state. He has a court date for his recent arrest and we're hoping that he gets put in jail for previous charges he has and that we can get her out and in a safe space by then. We don't know why she keeps going back to him or letting him back in the house but she won't press charges or kick him out or anything. Our greatest fear now is that he's going to k\*ll her before his court date and we don't know what to do. She didn't want her siblings knowing about it for some reason but my cousins the one who confided in my mom and I because he's worried about his mom and it's of course taking a big toll on him as well. Any advice on what our family can do to try and safely get her out of that house and get a restraining order/order of protection against him? Even his own family told her to get one against him, he's an evil evil person. We just want her to finally be safe and have my cousin feel safe being with his mom and not having to worry about him hitting his mom in front of him or trying to go after him. Any advice is welcomed, we're just at a loss of what to do and want to protect her anyway we can without her knowing that we know the full story if that makes sense. Because if she knows that my mom and I know about it then she'll stop talking to her family and then when/if that happens then we won't know if anything happened to her and can't help her leave. I know this is so long I'm sorry! Thank you for reading and any advice you may have! <3

Title: I am terrified to ask for help
Body:
TW: Physical abuse
I finally called the local DV number today. I stared at the phone for 10 minutes before pressing dial. My heart was racing and I was so nervous. A man answered, said they were closed for the day and to stop by tomorrow. He took down my name and I started to cry when he asked if this was about DV.

He kept asking me to repeat myself bc he couldn't understand me bc I was crying. 

WTF!! How am I ever going to get through this exit plan if I can barely get through a phone call? I know he thought I was pathetic. 

I have finally decided, after all this time, to reach out to the legal advocate about my plan to leave my own house in hopes that he leaves without me having to evict him. I will still give him eviction papers though, and immediately go no contact.

I was supposed to leave this week but that is a bit delayed bc I truly can't find a rental within a 3 hour radius that takes dogs that is under $5000/month. No shit.

Most of the time I push my thoughts away, but the truth is that I'm still afraid of him. It's been 3 years since he went to jail for choking me. I took him back bc he said he would never drink again. That was a lie. I brushed the entire incident aside at the time. I just want him out of my life. But every time I break up, he won't leave. Acts like everything is fine.

I feel like a broken record bc I have been sharing more lately, mostly on the narc abuse sub, but every time I share, I get closer to leaving. My secret is out. My shame is lessened. Thanks for listening!!

Title: How do you move on/cope mentally after an abusive relationship?
Body:
Almost 7 years ago I was in a toxic relationship for 3 years. Things started off as what you could describe as a ‚Äúperfect‚Äù relationship, we were both in such a great place but after time things turned for the worst. It all started after the first time we had sex when he became more and more controlling. It started off as  things like not being able to speak to male friends and blocking every single thing I had of them; to me only being allowed to wear jeans, having to look at the ground while walking with him. Things also became more violent, I would get hit, kicked, bitten, strangled and even get forced to have sex (if I refused this he would only get more violent). He would also verbally abuse me in any way I could which has completely destroyed every bit of self esteem and confidence I have and when I tried to leave or question the toxic relationship he would threaten me with committing suicide. I was only young at the time and was so scared to go to someone for help, even my parents whom at this time I was still living with. 

I managed to get myself out of this relationship but years on I am still being emotionally affected by this. When things ended I was bad for sleeping with guys but now that I am in my first serious relationship things feel so different. My new boyfriend of over one year is amazing and I really can‚Äôt fault him but because of my past things are starting to drift. I get so nervous when it comes to things like disputes, especially in public where I just freak out and start telling him I‚Äôm sorry and not to get mad. I can‚Äôt kiss him when people are around because I worry that they will see and laugh or talk about me.  It‚Äôs also caused us to have a really bad sex drive as I just seem to never be in the mood which then makes him feel like I‚Äôm not attracted to him and don‚Äôt won‚Äôt him. Don‚Äôt get me wrong he is so understanding of things especially my past but i can tell these things are pushing us apart. 

I can‚Äôt go out in public without feeling like everyone is staring at me and talking about me which only started the same time as my new relationship.

I have been on antidepressants for over a years as I was diagnosed with severe anxiety and depression. I‚Äôm really falling apart mentally and keep having flashbacks and dreams of events from my past relationship. I have tried to use all apps and websites etc that I have been told are useful but between them and doctors I feel like I am not getting anywhere and don‚Äôt know where else to turn to as I am not usually one for posting on this.

Title: My husband left me for someone else, but my lie is preventing a possible reconciliation
Body: A little over a month ago, after our son's graduation, my husband left me for another woman. They were co-workers, he admitted that they were flirtatious at work. She's younger (28) and my husband is (45) this woman is unbelievably attractive! She had been hitting on my husband for some time. My husband came home from this first in-person conference, since Covid. I knew something was off. Two days later, my husband calls me at my office, saying we must talk. He broke down in tears and confessed everything. I was beyond shocked, numb and my heart is broken. He was my first and only, he always treated me like a queen. I never even caught I'm looking at another woman.¬† He has been open and honest. He said they had slept together and that he's in love. He has moved out and he takes care of all the finances and makes sure I am ok. I do appreciate it. I have tried out of respect for our son, and our close-knit families to keep everything amicable. I'm so self-conscious of my appearance now. My self-esteem was zilch!¬† I have been in the gym 5 days a week, eating well. I feel better! Physically. But I am so hurt and ashamed. We have been married for twenty years. We moved here from Milan Italy in 2019 full time joining his brother and his now ex-wife. My husband and his brothers own a successful business together. We had a graduation dinner party celebration weekend at a resort for our son and I was trying my best to be kind and not make things difficult. He did not bring his girlfriend. I didn't stay long. I returned to my room early. It was just too difficult. My husband has started sending me flowers and texts saying he is so sorry. He never wanted to hurt me. I know he's a good man. You can't help who you fall in love with. I don't blame him for falling out of love with me. I guess people change. He swears he is still in love with me. But I don't believe that is possible. My brother-in-law invited me down for drinks and to talk. He and my husband are brothers. They're very close. He's two yrs older. He just went through a divorce. He can relate so he said. I think I had a bit too much to drink. I'm not a big drinker. I wasn't drunk but. I definitely felt buzzed. He walked me back to my room. It was late 2 am!!? I recall him asking to come in, I wasn't thinking clearly. I let him in. He had another drink. Next thing I know he's kissing me, telling me his brother is a fool for leaving me. I asked him to stop. Punches me in the face, busting my nose. He grabs me by the throat and throws me across the floor. He's kicking me. Saying that I am no good for his brother. No wonder he left me for this other woman(I won't say her name) He forces himself on me. Raping me. I tried to push him off but he choked me, I fell unconscious. After it was over he's apologizing profusely. He started talking crazy saying I was drunk. We were having sex and I started fighting him. I went into the bathroom. I cleaned myself up. I was in total shock. I was scared. He made me swear not to say anything. Because if I do. They will lose the business and my son would not attend college. I need to just let it go. Things just got out of hand. So I let it go. I checked out the next morning. I was really beat up. Marks on my neck. I have a cracked rib, bruised arms. My face was bruised. Not even my sunglasses could hide it. When I returned home, I saw a family friend who was just shocked and concerned. I lied and said I was in an accident. Which of course got back to my husband, who in turn flips out!! For the next week I am lying to him about why I am all banged up. We are in family counseling to lessen the blow to our son. I'm lying still about what happened. My husband comes to me yesterday and says he has been praying and working through his issues and he broke off his relationship with his girlfriend. He's realized he was wrong. Made a mistake and wants to know if I would ever in a million years consider trying to make our marriage work again. He would do anything to make it right. I love my husband. I would try and work on is. But now. After what has happened and I have been lying and hiding the truth. If I tell him I was attacked by his brother. It will absolutely destroy EVERYTHING. My son's future. Our livelihood. I'm distraught. I'm stuck. I just know I cannot let my husband know what happened. I feel just as terrible as he does for cheating and leaving me. Maybe I'm worse. And the affair isn't what is preventing a "possible" reconciliation of our marriage. It's my lie. I don't know how to handle all of this. I can keep quiet. There are so many lives in the balance. If I just keep this quiet. We'll be fine. I can't help but think of losing it all and jeopardizing my son's ability to attend college. What would you do? I have thought so much my brain literally hurts!!!. Please Help.

Title: I have just witnessed child abuse.
Body:
I never come out of my cave, but this time I finally got out to go shopping with my mother. I was in a big shopping mall. There was this fat lady in front of me with her two little twin girls who couldn't have been more than 4 or 5 years old. They were crying and the mother was insulting them and hitting them. Not little slaps, but very big slaps on the back of the head. She also pulled their hair, and abused them by pulling their arms violently. When she brought her hand close to them, the little girls would shield themselves with their arms and cry even more. Some people watched the scene without saying or doing anything (that doesn't mean the agreed).

I wouldn't say my mother was abusive, but she once pulled my hair, threw water in my face and scratched my back until it bled when I was little. When I saw the two little girls being abused, I had a flashback of that and I couldn't help but talk to the woman. I told her that this was no way to treat her children, and she started threatening me, calling me very vulgar names (plus she wasn't wearing the mask even though she had to, and luckily I didn't get any spit). I mean, I'm 17 and I'm not a light, so I'm a bit vulgar and impulsive sometimes... but I've never been as vulgar and threatening as this woman. I wasn't scared by her threats, and I would have even fought back if it had gone any further. But then I looked around, and everyone was looking at us. I mean, everyone was looking at ME. Not my mother next to me, not the lady and her daughters, no, people were looking at ME. I'm quite sensible to that and at the time, I thought I was wrong. That it was my fault, that I should have kept my mouth shut, that it's none of my business, that everyone has their own shitty life and that's all.

I cried for an hour without stopping. I asked myself what I should have done. If I could have, I would have called the police. My mother told me not to worry about others, that there are worse things in life, that at least this woman hit her children in public while others do it in the shadows. When I told my mother that I should have called the police or protective services, she laughed at me and told me that in that case I would have had to testify for nothing, and that she was too tired today to stay at the police station for 3 hours.

In the car, I was silently crying with guilt. I never cry about anything, but this finished me off for X reason. My mother thought I had a cold or allergies. I cried and thought I could have called the police, that I had nothing to lose by doing so, but instead I listened to my mother and the looks on people's faces and walked away.

I feel miserable because even now I don't know what I should have done, or even if what I did was right or wrong. Should I have kept my mouth shut and thought like my mother? Should I have called the police even though I am a complete stranger? I don't know. I don't fucking know. And I feel terrible. What do you think I should have done?

Title: A Dangerous Man
Body:
So this is long, and I wasn't sure what flair was most appropriate, but...


On the last day of 2020, my (39f) ex (32m) and I separated. We‚Äôd been together for six years. 90% of our time together was great, but within the first year I learned that he would react with explosive anger to even the slightest, most gentle criticism. He would treat me ‚Äì and occasionally others, including housemates ‚Äì with extreme contempt. A series of housemates left because they couldn‚Äôt get along with him. During the six years we spent together, he never apologized for anything. Apologies were just not part of his vocabulary.¬†

Between these traits, and the fact that he told me he didn‚Äôt like my family, wasn‚Äôt committed to the relationship, and didn‚Äôt want to live in the small town we‚Äôd moved to in 2019, I decided that the relationship could not continue, although I did ask if he would consider therapy to try and save it (he did not).¬†

We didn‚Äôt have much of a conversation about this. I said something like, it looks like both of us are ready for this relationship to end. He just started moving his stuff out of our bedroom and into the spare. He stayed for two months and we hardly exchanged a dozen words. I start teleworking from my bedroom, eating in my bedroom, and keeping the door closed.

On March 1, he moves out and I immediately have a locksmith come re-key the locks. He moves into a rented room in the same small town. He can‚Äôt get along with the housemates and is kicked out within a month. He is homeless for a few weeks. He is buying a house in a small town about 30 minutes away. He moves in with mutual friends temporarily until he can close on it. Friends live in the same town as I do. I‚Äôve known them for more than ten years and they ask if I‚Äôd be comfortable with him staying there. I tell them I wouldn‚Äôt visit while he‚Äôs there but that I‚Äôm fine with it and think it‚Äôs very generous of them to share their home with him. Maybe I should have told them that I think he is dangerous.¬†

Friends have a party over the weekend of July 4, and invite him, me, and some other folks I haven‚Äôt seen in a long time and really want to visit with. Friend told ex that I would be there and that he needed to be nice (he‚Äôs been staying at her house for free for about two months by now). But he was quite rude to me at the party. It didn‚Äôt bother me, I knew it was a distinct possibility, and I got to see other people there. After the party, she said something about his behavior and he got so enraged that she asked him to leave. He made demands, was contemptuous, used physically threatening body language, and gave her a murderous look on his way out the door. These are all things I‚Äôve seen from him before. Friend is in her 60s and tells me he‚Äôs the most dangerous person she‚Äôs ever been around. I feel awful for having brought him into her life (although I know we‚Äôre all adults and she chose to be friends with him as well).¬†¬†

Here‚Äôs why I‚Äôm afraid of him:¬†
- He drives by my house often (and not because it‚Äôs on his way to anywhere)¬†
- He frequently asks mutual friends about me (but refuses to talk to me)
- He has been physically violent in the past (not often, but he once choked me until I passed out, as well as other less serious incidents)
- He has a lot of anger and I think he would be capable of harming me.¬†

I do think it‚Äôs unlikely that he would come here. But if he did, I believe I would be in danger. Ever since he was kicked out of friend‚Äôs house, these worries have been stronger. I sleep with a hatchet next to my bed.¬†

I would appreciate any advice on how I can stay safe and feel safe in my home.¬†Some perspectives on what happened between him and my friend, and my role in that would also be helpful. I apologized to her and her husband but I still feel really bad about it. For some reason I assumed he would treat them better than he did me or our housemates. The whole situation is also making me feel like I'm not a good judge of character. 

Thanks in advance for any replies.

I am badly affected by trauma I experienced over the years, and cannot find anyone who truly understands the insidiousness of this.

My dad was ripped to pieces in court, and to be honest, even if he got custody, I don't know if he could have taken better care of me. I could not tell the court I wanted to be put in a foster home because at the time I was too young.

Title: Unsent Letter
Body:
Dear A******,


I love you. Ive loved you since that first afternoon on the dock. But of course, that was your plan, wasn't it? You only wanted to get into my pants at the time. You still wanted to get back together with J***. I was just a place holder. A warm hole to slide your dick in to.¬†

But you claim that you started falling for me too. It took at least a year for you to finally realise that J*** wasnt coming back, and to start investing in a life with us. But the abuse started way before then. Within 4 months of us being together, you raped me for the first time on your mother's bathroom floor. You claim that you were so close to coming and something in you snapped. I tried to use our safe word, many times. I tried to escape. I tried to say no. But you overpowered me. I threatened to scream for your brother and you put your hand over my mouth. At that point, I gave up and let you finish.¬†

Shortly thereafter I found out I was pregnant. (Not from rape. The timing didnt work out.) I started having immense pain from the pregnancy and did not frequently want to have sex like we used to. This angered you. I would try to still have sex, because I genuinely wanted it to work, but usually had to stop you because I was in so much pain. Often times you made me keep going after I said stop. One time I stopped you and pulled away from you and you got so angry that you punched the hell out of the bathroom door and left several large holes and screamed at me "LOOK WHAT YOU MADE ME DO!" I began sobbing hysterically, curled up in a ball on the floor. You finally walked away and I started to take a bath and curled up in the warm water, trying to nurse my physical and emotional wounds and remind myself that it was not my fault that you shredded the bathroom door. You made me talk to you about it right after too, when I wasnt ready to talk, especially to you.¬†

Also during this time, your jealousy and controlling behaviors were consuming my life. I was not allowed to see any of my friends or family because "you felt left out." I would invite you to come with me, but you never felt comfortable spending time around my family or friends. So I cancelled all my plans and stayed with you. Any time I so much as looked at another man, you became irrationally jealous and assumed I wanted to sleep with him or already had.¬†

Several people warned me that you were a serial cheater when we got together. I have experience in non-monogamous relationships and thought that of we made a deal where we could sleep with other people as long as we were open and honest with each other, and we were coming home to each other at night, that it we would find a happy moddle ground between you cheating and being faithful to me. All I wanted was to know that you loved me. If you were playing on the side, I didnt really care as long as you were being careful and werent bringing home any diseases or getting anyone else pregnant. But over time, your jealousy and posessiveness has made this arrangement impossibly unfair. Every single man I have expressed interest in fooling around with, you have found some reason to shoot down. All the while, you have slept with many other women throughout our entire relationship. This arrangement can only work on a level playing field.¬†

The rapes continued through most of my pregnancy and shortly after. You were too strong for me to overpower you and you frequently wrapped your defined arms around me or held me down. There were many times you came into our bedroom, literally ripped my pants off, and did whatever you wanted to whatever hole you wanted, and finished. Afterwards I would say "I didn't want that at all."

My mental health suffered immensely for it. My struggles throughout my pregnancy were mainly related to you abusing me. Yes, not being on my meds and being pregnant and hormonal fueled the fires, but it was mainly feeling unsafe.¬†

But then something happened. Shortly after A**** was born, I went into the hospital one last time again redrelated to your raping me and the stress of having a sick newborn in the hospital. I came out feeling better than I ever have, and for some reason, the rapes stopped. My life felt calm, well ordered, and I felt in control for the first time in years. I started to feel like we could really have a future.¬†

But the last few months things have been unraveling again. You've started raping me again. Saying things like "That's my hole" and "I've always had a fantasy to rape someone. To have that kind of control." I fight you and I struggle to push you off of me and say No and Stop and still you persist. Still you put your hands over my mouth. You slap me and choke me. We are so close to having the family home that we wanted.¬†

I now know that it's impossible for you to love me the way I deserve. I now know that that family home we have fantasized about is just that- a fantasy. My and A**** deserve better. I won't have my son growing up seeing his father treat me this way.¬†

I am pregnant again. And I am going to have this baby. I am going to have that family home. But I now know that it can't be with you.¬†


Love,


S

Title: Conflicting feelings

I have a child (F2) with a man (M30) I have not lived with in over a year, during that time we have had many conflicts mainly from the fact that we didn't live together and the logistics of sharing time with our daughter. He is not what I would call an overtly nice person but he can kind and compassionate. 
He tends to be very loud and say VERY hurtful things when he is upset but he rarely gets physical (only once before I moved out). It's not ok and I understand verbal abuse is just as damaging but I genuinely love this man and I want a family together. 
Which brings us to current events, after staying the night at his place there was a disagreement over something literally so stupid and insignificant which resulting in me wanting to leave with my daughter. I was calmly walking away and he bent down and grabbed her, pushing me away, and told me she wasn't going anywhere. This lead to me calling the police and him being arrested ( I didn't press charges the state did). He's since been released but there is a no contact in place. 
He's never been abusive towards his daughter and I don't fear for my safety, should I try to modify the no contact early or let things play out until after he goes to trial? Does any one have experience with no contact?
 Every one is urging me to take legal actions ( restraining  orders ect) to make a good case if there is a custody trial ( there is nothing currently in place) but that doesn't feel right to me. Am I being ignorant about this?

Title: Need Help! Mom in abusive relationship. She left but cant get her things from her home because he wont leave.
Body:
My mom is in an abusive relationship. Her and her boyfriend own the home.

# History:

They fought a lot and I had even called the cops on him thinking he was raping her one night. She didn't press charges and she had called police on him a couple times but she always felt too guilty to follow through.

End of May their fights were escalating on nightly basis. She finally called the police. She had bruises on her from nights prior. That night I overheard them fighting and was recording from a hidden area. You can hear him charging at her and her muffled screams as he pinned her down. When she called the police she told him that's it its over. He walked off laughing and saying that he was going to get me arrested for a scratch on his face (I never touched him and hadn't even seen him that night) . pretty sure he was going to try and pin it on me for some reason.

The officers came and he lied saying he was asleep and she attacked him and thats why he has a scratch on his face. (the scratch was not a human scratch and looks like a paper cut)

My mom who was clearly shooken up, got her dates mixed up during the week of when she received her bruises. She was saying Monday and I said Sunday so a day off. the bruises were still visible and i even showed the officers the audio proof but they said the bruises weren't from tonight so they aren't related to this call...

The officers arrested her. I honestly don't know why. Even a fellow officer and prosecutor were "Shocked" at how awful this was handled after viewing the report and listening to the call.

**My mom was arrested and then given a no contact order for a month.** Because of the fact that she was arrested for battery, she then wasn't allowed to work until it was removed.

# Current State:

Its been almost a month, the prosecutor dropped the charges after viewing the report and speaking with our lawyer. I was able to help my mom get a home but when we went to go file a restraining order against him **our lawyer advised against it** because the court will see that the offender (my mom) is now filing a restraining order and requesting to sell the house through the court and they may dismiss it entirely because she was the one arrested that night.

We need to get her things, we want to go this weekend and **he refuses unless she goes away with him this weekend**. So now he will be there while me and my younger siblings and my mom pack everything. We are truly scared of him. **He has shown psychotic and bi-polar behavior**.

I called Domestic abuse hotline asking if there is something we can do to ensure that he isn't present while we gather our things and they only provided numbers to other organizations that couldn't help.

I don't know what to do. **He has guns in the house**, **he is crazy**, I am scared my mom is going to be another murdered statistic. **If anyone has any idea of what we can do to get him away for the weekend so we can pack our things please let me know.**

# TL;DR:

***Mom was in an abusive relationship with a psychotic ex that she owns a home with. I got her another home to move into and she and my siblings need to grab their things from the home but he wont leave even for a day or weekend to grab items. We don't know what we can do to ensure that he is gone in order for us to pack everything.  Does anyone have any suggestions?***

Title: Is this Domestic Abuse?
Body:
I'm not biologically related to this woman. She lives in the house with my boyfriend and I, and she's his Mother. She may be my future MIL because he wants to marry me. Let's call her Jill.

Jill convinced us to move to the country with her years ago. Jill tells my doctors that I am her child so that she can get my medical records, and sometimes it works. 

Jill says I can't get a car/drivers license or she'll call the police and kick my boyfriend and I out and we'll be homeless. Jill always needs our money or she'll kill our pets, or she'll starve, or she'll make sure we get fired from work. 

Jill follows us in her car from a small distance whenever we leave the house to do anything, and will occasionally get into altercations with my manager over my schedule (she wants me at home, cleaning, and "for my own good").

Jill has threatened to strike my boyfriend if I don't make him behave, and has threatened to kill me. She scares me. I'm afraid when I leave the house or sleep, because I don't know what she'll do to the animals or to my boyfriend. She's already led to the death of my best friend (a kitty). 

Every time something bad happens or someone dies, she brings it up at every chance she gets, including things like showing me stuff that she knows will trigger anxiety (dead children), and things that will make me sad (repeatedly reminding me that my family home was underwater and is now probably torn down).

I tried to contact the abuse hotline, but I was told that they couldn't help me because I'm not dating Jill. 

I don't know what to do.

Title: 31F and 20M,
Body:
I am a 31 year old woman, and I am married to a man/boy who is 20, about to be 21 years old in two months. We met when I was 29 and he was 19. He thought I was much younger when he wanted to date me, maybe its my genes, small boobs, and obsession with health, so maybe I looked less womanly. Due to my high functioning autism, I am sometimes naive, which could be mistaken for being young, and he would help me or "guide" me with certain social things.  We got married one year ago next month. 

Recently, he had me buy him alcohol (he is not legal until he is 21). He got angry while drinking, and threatened to break my iphone "so i couldnt talk to my sister" anymore. I begged him not to throw my phone down, and he finally put it down. But I told him if this is how he gets on alcohol I wont be buying any for him. Then he said I can find my own place to live and my own money to spend. When I started crying I said I would likely commit suicide then because we met in the mental hospital after both of us had actual suicide attempts. We had fallen in love and decided we would live to be together. We had been through homelessness and vanlife and now we have an apartment and he has a construction job. In the past, he has thrown things at me and threw the grocery cart into my legs but he hadnt done anything for 6 months and I thought he was putting his past behind him.

Back to the story. He said he would commit suicide right now then, right here... that we should both die together, and I said no, I am not ready. He insisted, and said if I tell on him he would kill me. That killing comment came out of nowhere, and I asked for clarification. He said if I call the cops on him while he is killing himself right now, he will kill me RIGHT NOW. Do I agree? No, I don't agree, I started crying and panicking. it was terrifying. I turned on my phones recorder and started playing dumb to him like what do you mean you will tell on me? and he said, I already told you, IM GONNA KILL YOU BITCH. Then he grabbed my feet and dragged me out of the bed, my body was slammed to the floor, my head banged to the ground, bopping back and forth while he dragged me to the kitchen, I have puffy brusing on my back and bleedin rug burn on my back, then he punched my jaw and threw me down on the ground as tried to get up, grabbed a steak knife and put it to my neck, and said he would kill me right here as I begged for my life. I seriously thought this was the end of me, and I thought about my parents, and my son (previous marriage).  I can honestly say my desire to kill myself went away, my survival instincts were in full gear and I told myself If i survive Im going to a shelter as soon as it is safe to get away. I was imagining packing a bag and leaving as fast as humanly possible.

Well, I was in such shock, he apologized, of course, I was mad for a day, I felt bad for him, I let him back, I rationalized the story, I listened to the tape, convinced myself it wasnt good enough to call the cops, and I thought about what would happen to him if I did call - arrest, jail time, felony, etc... I thought that I would be blamed for fucking up his whole life, he is only 20, and has been through so much, foster care, abuse, neglect, etc in his life- that he is doing really well for himself at this point, and I thought I was helping him along, I seriously dont know what to do, because he called me a bitch today again, and he has never done that before the other day, and (sigh)... I don't know what to do . 

​

Any thoughtts,advice, apprecited.

Title: My Mother Hit Me Just Now.
Body:
This stress is gonna kill me eventually. I can actually feel it in my chest lately.

So it all started this morning, when I was on a video call to a social worker (I think that's their title) who handles NDIS applications (Australian National Disability Insurance Scheme, basically extra funds for supporting people with disabilities). It was for my own disabilities, but my mother is severely disabled.

She overheard my half of the conversation, and I said at one point, when talking about my money, that my mother borrows a lot of money from me to gamble online.

This was a bad idea.

She's been pissed at me all day, because she doesn't believe that borrowing money from me and spending it on an online slots website is gambling, simply because it doesn't pay out - like that's somehow better.

She even straight up said in one sentence that she's spending money on a free site. She said that with zero irony.

Well she exploded about it in the car, and hit me in the chest. It didn't hurt, she's too weak for that. But it still shook me. She normally yells her head off at us instead. (She was driving)

I can't look after her anymore. I need to put her in a home or something. I can't look after her if she's going to be like this to me for the rest of her life.

I can't put her in a home, I don't even know the first steps for doing that. She thinks she can put \*me\* in a home. Like, wtf? I'm almost 30, and I can look after myself for the most part. Our lives are just a huge fucking mess. 

P.S. I live with my mother and my brother. Brother doesn't do much looking after of her, especially when it might interrupt DOTA 2. I just need to get out of here.

Title: your life can look different, there is hope
Body:
I am 29F and I have been in 3 really abusive relationships. when I was 17 I was with a man who suffered from BPD and he used to tell me to go kill myself, would hit me, choke me, tell me I was too dark and that my hair looked better when it was straight, stalk me, threaten me - the whole nine yards.

then at 20 I got with another abusive man. I was on birth control and I got pregnant. he wouldn't allow me to get an abortion. he cheated on me with my 15 yr old sister and my naturopathic dr. he abused me financially. would not let me go to work or school.. I have been raising our 8 yr old son on my own now for 8 yrs. and I started stripping a yr after my son was born so that way I could get a bed, a car, phone, rental, food etc. I have been stripping for 7 years. I got myself out of poverty this way.

then at 25 I met this really amazing man who used to make fun of my body, poke me in my chest because I didn't sleep with him sooner, he purposefully gave me HSV2 and then told me I was too loose to enjoy sex with after contracting the std. he treated me like I was stupid, he would look at me like I was worthless and he told me I wasn't good enough to be treated with respect.

now at almost 30 I just got accepted to a dental hygiene program and my grades are so good that I accepted for a scholarship at a different school a technological school.

I used to think those men were right about me, that my body was ugly or that I wasn't good at anything, that I wasn't like the other girls, that I was less..but they were wrong! even if I work at a grocery store I am still me and I still worthy of respect, even if I stay a dancer, I am still whole and worthy.

you never deserved it, you deserve to have your voice, your space, your body and to be free from submitting your will to someones opinion.

it is time to take the pen out of the abusers hands and write your own story - you are worth it and you always have been

Title: Trying to cobble together a written account of all the abuse that's happened
Body:
I received interrogatories from my ex's lawyer just this past week, and one of the things I have to provide is a written, detailed account of every single instance of physical and emotional abuse that's happened over the course of our marriage.  It's so hard to relive some of this.  I never wanted to think about it again, but here we are... not only do I have to deal with it, I have to write it down and allow other people to read it.

I am normally a meticulous record keeper, of everything.  I've got budget spreadsheets going back 10 years.  I have my life well organized.  But for some reason, I've resisted documenting things as the abuse occurred.  I resisted taking pictures and getting proof.  I've taken pictures of my bruises and my scraped, bloody elbows only to delete them a few days later.  Maybe because that would make it real?  Maybe because then I couldn't deny or minimize the issue?  I don't know.  All I know is my brain is doing everything it can to NOT think about all the dark things that asshole's put me through.

I am so close to being free.  I have to co-parent with him for 6 years until my daughter's 18, and then I can be completely free.

Title: I reported my abuser and I don‚Äôt know how to feel.
Body:
I do not approve for this to be shared or posted anywhere. 

I am doing this on mobile, so if the formatting is weird that is why.

I f18 have been in an abusive relationship for almost two years now. It was pretty bad. He m18 is a narcissist and was extremely emotionally abusive. He even raped me several times while we were together and he made me so isolated. He made me believe he was the only person I had and we had an extreme trauma bond.

Yesterday was a mistake. I went with him. We went to Burger King and it was fine until I asked him ‚Äúhave you been talking to any girls.‚Äù And he said ‚Äúwellll.‚Äù So I took it and saw he was snapping the girl back and forth all day that he immediately added after I told him he needed to change. This was because he left me on the side of the road in the middle of night to walk home alone. And it hurt so much. 

I also noticed he had Reddit which was weird because I had begged him to get it for months so I could show him funny things I see. And I saw he was only watching porn on it. And he had it for 83 days. I confronted him and he fought me for the phone and I ended up getting out. He started to yell at me and emotionally degrade me. 

I went to walk down the ditch to my grandmas, and I saw a homeless camp and decided it wasn‚Äôt safe. I sat on the wall of the Burger King and he came up to me and was telling me stuff and stuff. I went back to his car and this was the mistake.

We gave me his phone and I asked how long he had been looking at porn while we dated, hence the 83 days. He admitted for awhile and I was sobbing because of how much I was in pain. He tried to take the phone again and we were fighting over it and he punched me in the face. 

My lip is bruised and has a big bump. My teeth hurt and my jaw hurts as well. I got out of the car immediately and I was in shock. He had never hit me before. I told him to leave that my family was coming, and I went inside the Burger King and tried to calm down. I had my aunt come pick me up and later called my mom to pick me up from my aunts .

My mom told me to file a police report. We went all over town and they were all closed. We had to call and wait for 3 hours on hold and they didn‚Äôt come until midnight. I filed it but I don‚Äôt know how to feel. I don‚Äôt feel relief at all. I am worried for him and he was telling me he didn‚Äôt mean to hit me and he wanted to kill himself.

I just need some help with how to feel about this. I don‚Äôt know if what I did was right.

Title: Why do we stay and why won‚Äôt we leave?
Body:
Multiple TW So this is gonna be kind of long to give some background:

There is a history of things like this happening but I thought we were better and In a better place. So this morning I took a long shower as I‚Äôve been sick and haven‚Äôt been feeling well and showers always make you feel good. So when I got out, I toweled off and went to the room to get dressed. My bf took his daughter into the bathroom so they could get ready and I guess I didn‚Äôt dry off good enough and she slipped and hurt herself. I poked my head out of the room and asked if she was ok? She was crying and he gave me this look of death. So I asked what happened still not registering that there was water on the floor, he sharply growled at me, ‚Äúthere‚Äôs water everywhere!‚Äù
So I went back in the room and continued to get dressed. She wasn‚Äôt dressed so I was letting him get her together before I came out to apologize or say anything to her. So he comes into the room understandably upset but is screaming and cussing at me, ‚ÄúI tell you all the fucking time about the water‚Äù on the floor.‚Äù So I say it was an accident and I‚Äôm sorry and he‚Äôs like ‚Äúdon‚Äôt apologize to me‚Äî apologize to her! You didn‚Äôt even apologize or ask if she was ok!‚Äù ‚ÄúYes I did ask if she was ok that‚Äôs the first‚Äî‚Äú ‚Äúwhatever man, now she‚Äôs hurt and you don‚Äôt even fucking care‚Äù

So he left and he comforts her. So I was ready to leave it alone and apologize to her when I was dressed and she was out of the bathroom but I heard him telling her, I‚Äôm sorry baby because somebody doesn‚Äôt know how to dry off before they leave the bathroom people get hurt. Now this is when I actually got upset. Dont sir there and talk to your kid about me. I feel like it opens the door for other things.later on that but anyway. He comes back in the room so I asked him why he would tell her that, it‚Äôs an accident. So he wouldn‚Äôt back down saying he can say whatever to his daughter. Meanwhile our 1 year old son sees this and is imitating his aggressive tone and behavior. So when his daughter is on the couch I go out and apologize and say I‚Äôm sorry and it was an accident and I didn‚Äôt mean for it to happen to her. I asked her if she was ok. And she says to me (I believe as a result of him talking to me any kind of way in front of her) ‚Äúno because you left water on the floor so I got hurt‚Äù 

So now I‚Äôm frazzled because I tell him to be mindful of respecting me in front of the kids. So now he‚Äôs calling me stupid and still going on about how I never get the water off the floor and so for whatever reason I grab my shoes and put them on in the room and my feet were on the bed. I honestly wasn‚Äôt thinking at this point. We‚Äôre arguing back and forth and my mind was going in a million directions. But he sees it and it was world war 3. 

‚ÄúWtf stupid bitch why are your feet on the bed? That‚Äôs so fucking dirty. You don‚Äôt think! You‚Äôre dumb you‚Äôre stupid. I can‚Äôt wait until you get your own fucking place‚Äù what? So now you‚Äôre telling me to leave. So I ask him what he‚Äôs saying and he says, ‚ÄúI mean you don‚Äôt respect this house so you act like you want to leave‚Äù. That‚Äôs his passive way of saying he‚Äôs not telling me to leave but my behavior is saying I want to leave. Whenever he breaks up with me which is every other week sometimes this is a popular one. So I gather my things and leave. 

I tried to come home as late as possible not wanting to talk to him and he is sitting up in the living room. His daughter was sleeping in our room since she‚Äôs visiting but he sleeps with her and my son sleeps in his room and my space is the living room. So I felt like he was in my space. So I ask him was he going to the back and he nastily says no he‚Äôs watching the game. So I ask him where was I gonna go and he was like, ‚Äúi don‚Äôt care. The game is almost over you can wait‚Äù so while I‚Äôm waiting I bring up what happened earlier and ask him why he didn‚Äôt apologize to me since me apologizing to his daughter is clearly so important. So he goes into because I don‚Äôt deserve an apology because I was wrong and I‚Äôm dumb so he can call me a stupid bitch. ‚ÄúWhat are you going to do about it?‚Äù Is what he asked me. So at some point when he was talking I kind of zoned out and got on my phone. So he threw his cup at me and was like, ‚Äúyou wanted to talk I‚Äôm talking but you get on your phone?!‚Äù Speechless I only manage to say ‚Äúwhat?‚Äù And he throws my phone out of my hands across the room and is like he‚Äôs sick of me because if he were on his phone while we were talking I would get mad and before I could apologize or say anything he rushed me. He‚Äôs choking me. He‚Äôs slapping me. ‚ÄúWhy are you doing this?‚Äù I kept asking. 

Afterward he proceeded with his evening and told me I didn‚Äôt deserve an apology 

This is not the first time and everytime he gets more and more comfortable with it. I don‚Äôt call him out of his name, I know he has a temper so I rarely even curse at him when we are arguing. He thinks I‚Äôm nagging because I tell him I want to address the disrespect you spew at me? I should let it go he says. And it‚Äôs a problem because I tell you hey I think it‚Äôs wrong and I don‚Äôt like to be disrespected, especially in front of the kids. He tells me I‚Äôm not worthy of the same respect he would give his children or mother.. clearly because you won‚Äôt apologize for anything without a fight but you wanted me to be ready to apologize in an instant when your daughter got hurt because of an accident I caused? 

I‚Äôm going to my sisters for a couple days tomorrow to decompress and try to get my head together. It‚Äôs so hard to let go because I think about the good times we have but when things are bad, they‚Äôre always this extreme and he finds a way to blame it on me. I feel like I stay sometimes to prove that I‚Äôm good enough. I don‚Äôt know. But I always feel like I‚Äôm trying to make him happy like I‚Äôm not good enough. I left the house. I‚Äôm just in my car now, crying and confused

Edit: 

This happens frequently but another incident where he flew off the handle was when I had been working out in the house and I didn‚Äôt take a shower immediately after why? Because I‚Äôm the primary caretaker of our son and I still had other chores and cooking to do while he was asleep. Then there was a lightening storm at night so I couldn‚Äôt take a shower so I essentially worked until I fell asleep without showering. I have impeccable hygiene. I typically shower twice a day, carry a tooth brush with me etc. so he comes home from work in the middle of the night attempting to surprise me for sex which I wasn‚Äôt in the mood for anyway, and he was FURIOUS that I didn‚Äôt bathe. Calling me a dirty bitch nasty and storms back out of the house back to work. His temper is outrageous!!!! It‚Äôs like I‚Äôm not allowed to be human and make mistakes around him

Title: I am a 16 year old and my mother is an abusive relationship. I need as much help as you can offer.
Body:
Tw: sexual abuse, emotional abuse, suicide, child abuse. Self harm. (If there are any more please tell me.)  

 I hope that I can get some sort of advice. I am begging here, please upvote and spread this as much you possibly can. I need all of the advice I can get. I am also  going to be describing whatever I know of in as much detail I can mentioning quotes and all so if you get turned off by any of the the above trigger warnings please leave. 


To start my family is not exactly the most well off. My aunt and nan (grandmother just so everyone knows) are unemployed and my mother is the only one employed at the moment. My mother is a single mother with four children. I am the oldest son and I have two brothers and a sister. My mother works at a large convenience store not far away from us. She has a boyfriend who is the manager at the place and is the abuser. Her boyfriend was the one who got her the job pretty much. He is a mix of absolute scum and a okay person. He is like this due to alcohol (of course) and we have had multiple instances of times when he and my mother weren't talking at all for some reason. Big red flag for me. 

Then, around 1 or 2 years ago because of him my mother attempted suicide by overdosing on some sort of painkiller. She just couldn't take it anymore and I'm not going to lie I can't remember a thing that they said before everything happened that night. I remember barging into their room, telling my mother that she shouldn't and "I've had those thoughts too you shouldn't do it" or something like that (how ironic). We later moved downstairs and the ambulance wasn't coming fast enough so he called his sister to take them to the hospital. At this point I was just upstairs worried to death about the safety of my mother. By the time I went back down to listen in, his sister was there. He was smothering her and just shouting and in general being scum. She started having a panic attack. I barged in again, called him an idiot and next thing I know his hand was around my neck, good thing he didn't squeeze because I would have been fucked. His sister leaves because she was breaking down and he was drunk and being stupid. We then got my mothers friend to take her to the hospital and everything ended up okay. Thankfully. My nan then took care if us for the rest of the day while she was in the hospital. In hindsight I feel stupid for not recording anything because I could have shown it to police. 


Nevertheless, life went on and slowly he started fading back into our lives. Obviously it was very on and off because I'm sure they had their arguments when I was asleep very early in the morning and that led to me not seeing them together for a long time. 

Fast forward to current day actually a about two hours ago. Another incident. Part of me wanted to quote him but I have just realised that I do not at all want you to hear what I heard so I'm just going to say that because he was drunk he made it out as if she was cheating so that she could 'prove' she was not cheating by letting him get sexual with her. She obviously declined and then that led to them completely 'ending' their relationship. My mother owed him money as she is not working due to some pretty serious health reasons at the moment and that's why. That is also why she was not cheating. She is always at home. So is he, in fact the only time he ever leaves is for work. So I call bullshit. Due to her owing him money he took basically all her money that she had on her (not a lot) and a bunch of the food we have because he bought it. Nevermind that that was enough food to feed 4 kids and he is a manager in the store and perfectly wealthy enough to buy food. Or how he actually does have food in his home. He did it anyway and also told the person that came to pick him up that my mother was cheating on him. As I said, she isn't even really going out of the house at the moment unless it's with him and he has no proof. I got some of the audio of this argument on video which is pretty good in case anything happens though. 

Now you have been caught up. I'm currently trying to apply for a job and am doing everything I can to help my mam. I am starting college in a month so I won't be able to work as much as I want sadly. If you have any advice about what to do I urge you to comment. Please, I'm young and stupid and doing everything that I'm aware that I can. Just know that I am in the UK so if you give any legal advice just at least tell me you're speaking with your experience with you're countries laws. I don't mean to sound ungrateful I would just like to know if the law is from my country or not so I can look it up myself.

Title: Plea offer came through
Body:
The latest turn of events is that the DA has offered a plea deal to my wife. The charge is for felony assault with a deadly weapon. (She went psychotic and held a knife over me but luckily did not stab me.) The plea is down to 2 misdemeanors (one for weapon, other battery) and the punishments would be no jail time, 52 week anger management, 40 hours community service (she's somewhat disabled physically), 3 years of peaceful contact to me (not sure the full implications of that), and then something about other fees and such. This generally seemed like what we had hoped for. I think it would give me protections and seems like it's not too harsh for what happened.   


She said she can't talk about the plea situation with me. I don't know exactly why that would be, her lawyer told her. Her lawyer tells her to do a lot of shit that seems to come at my expense. Defense lawyer. She said she's meeting with the lawyer in a week and a half to discuss it. Why it would take that long I'm not sure. If she's thinking of actually going to trial instead... that seems nuts to me.

I'm not sure what I'm looking for here so forgive me. Mostly I'm very anxious. I let my wife come back to the house back in February and live with my son while I go to work and I've been living in a rented room for 5 months now. It kills me to be away from my family especially my son because I've always been a family man. I do see my son every couple days or so but I have to be out somewhere and not at home, so I mostly take him to the park and dinners out. Theoretically we are hoping to get through this and come back together as a family. But honestly my wife says she can't talk to me much while criminal charges are going and I feel so stressed out about the whole situation. She makes me feel like I'm being dramatic all the time and things are going to escalate if we talk about heavy topics and then she fears getting arrested if an argument happens. I opted for the peaceful contact order instead of the more strict restraining order. I often feel very conflicted. If it were just me and her I would want a divorce. But I find it so hard to take an action to tear my family apart. Or it would mean removing her from the house or just starting a really nasty uphill legal battle that I would have to manage along with a full time job and a child, which is how things were shortly after her arrest and it was horrible. I just don't know how I got here. I often feel like I'm being dramatic or maybe so stressed out I'm not thinking clearly. I wish I had stuck with the family court and let them manage some of this. Or I wish I could sit in therapy with my wife or have a real talk. But I'm so worn out from waiting and not having my home and feeling so conflicted. I'm sorry.

Title: Hoping to move forward
Body:
I am human, therefore capable of mistakes. However, does that justify my STBXH kicking my ass outside of a bar? Giving me bruises, because I asked him to turn his music down? Dragging me to the mirror, by my neck, to call me old? Fucking me, while I am sleeping? Shoving his flaccid dick in my face? Sorry. What I'm trying to say is... my STBXH taught me one thing: I'm at the mercy of everyone.

I understand it is possible for me to heal. I am not trying to play a "victim card." I don't want to be homeless again, so I am trying to stay on track, rather than complain.

But that doesn't change the way I am wired. Even if I take a self-defense class, it's not my nature to use it. Like... even the 18 year old girls that I work with could take a knife and kill me, if they really wanted to. Would I fight back? I don't know.

It's just weird, at age 30, realizing how unguarded I am... how unguarded I've always been... I think about it every day. Kinda curious, if anyone else feels this way? At the mercy of everyone?

Title: Anyone with uk domestic abuse and custody knowledge? I need to break free from the abuse. Trigger warning domestic violence.
Body:
Hi, i am looking for any help or advice or even just some reassurance. This may be long also sorry if this isn't the right group, i am new to reddit. 
I (35f) was with my ex(m38) for 16 and have 3 children (16,11 &10). The whole relationship was abusive from extreme coercive control to multiple physical attacks, stalking me you name it he did it. 
I tried to leave multiple times but he had me so isolated and would up his violence, he stabbed himself in the leg to prevent me leaving. 

I eventually (3.5 years) called the police and they advised that my MARAC assessment had me as high risk of imminent death. I was given a place in a refuge with my children. Slowly i began to rebuild myself and my children as we lost every possession we owned but we now have a nice, clam, happy home. We all had/ have counselling. 

In the last 3 years i have had to have him charged x2 he was convicted of the first offence and is now registered as a domestic abuser. He is currently on bail for the second offence which also involves x2  gf's he met after me. It is highly likely he will be on the sex offenders register as a result. I will also be granted a non harassment order for a minimum of 5 years although i have requested a life time one also. 


In the last 3.5 years he has played every game in the book and refuses to pay child support. Yet i have tried to be fair and co parent as much as possible, . Until now. I believe if he is convicted and placed on the sex offenders register then he should not be allowed near our two daughters.
 Our 16 year old has been estranged from his dad and his whole family for over 2 years, due to his dad and ex inlaws not supporting his autism even though he is an excellent kid who any parent would be proud to have and doing amazing despite all the hassle he has had. His dad also made fun of our sons sexuality. 

Our daughters are too young to understand but when he has supervised (by exMIL)visits he quizzes them about me, uses their devices to check on me etc. Then i get the verbal backlash if he doesn't like what he finds. I have also found out ex MIL has allowed him to take them out without supervision multiple times. 

I have contacted a lawyer but he believes we continue the status quo until the outcome of the trial. Then build our case for custody as my ex refused to participate in a custody case  when i first left and hid so he couldn't be served papers. He would disappear for months then pop back up multiple times this happened over two years. 

My therapist has advised i have PTSD and he is my trigger. Even driving to his town i get anxiety/ panic attacks.( sweating, sick, shaking etc) although i NEVER show it to my children. I fall apart after they are out the car. 

Will a custody case take into account the prior domestic violence and his fresh charges since i left? My son not having contact, will that affect the case? 

Again sorry for the rambling i am just at my wits end trying to do what is best for the children while dealing with him.

Title: I'm scared I will go back to my abuser.
Body:
A couple of weeks ago, my abuser went too far. He could have killed me. It wasn't the first instance of physical violence, a lot has happened. He was an addict, and that part of our relationship had already caused so much damage. When he got clean I thought things could get better, but it turned out he was a worse person off the drugs. I've completely lost myself because of the abuse. 

I should be happy to be gone. I should be happy he went to jail. I should be glad the judge put in a 2 year protective order. But I'm not. I'm not excited about my job interview, or getting a car, or being at my family member's house or being away from him. I'm miserable. I miss him. And I know how he is, he will try to still call me or text me when he gets out of jail. And when he does I already know I will go back. I hate myself for it too. I hate myself for wishing I hadn't called the police. 

Right now, I know I will go back when he asks. Something is wrong with me. I can't stay away from him, even when he hurts me.
